name: Dungeon of Alexandria
description:
Haver the Hero descends upon an old dungeon. With the boss gone, who will defend the dungeon from the invading hero? Alexandria must step up and design devilish traps to repel the hero. But each time Haver returns, he returns stronger. Can Alexandria keep up with this ever-growing hero?

Controlled entirely with mouse.

Android version now available! double tap traps to rotate them!

Made by: Bughuni Team
- Abopo
- HyakuRiki
- Handstandish
- Yaztrue

There's a bonus stage after the credits, so check it out!

*Note to Kyle: Abopo lives in Japan, so if you could play our game in the latter half of the stream so he can watch live he'd be very grateful!*

Music & SFX by Epidemic Sound
